part1.title: Who we are
part1.content1: LionSkins was made by gamers and for gamers. We are pleased to see you use our service, and you can be sure that we wil never use any of your personal data for profit or for anything that does not involve a better user experience.
part1.content2: If you have any question regarding this privacy policy, feel free to <0>contact us</0>.

item1.name: Your Steam ID and username
item1.description: : only if you choose to sign up through Steam on our service

item2.name: Your e-mail address
item2.description: : only if you want to contact us from the contact form and expect an answer

item3.name: Your clicks on links to marketplaces' websites
item3.description: : everytime you click on one of the links that redirects you to a skin marketplace, we generate a unique and totally random id in order to have a rough idea of how our visitors interact with the marketplaces we suggest. This id is automatically deleted at the end of your visit, and cannot be linked back to your device or your person

part3.title: Third party services we use
part3.content1: We also use third-party services to make our site work like we want it to. Here's the list:

item1.name: Steam
item1.description: : Valve's well-known digital video game store. We use their OpenID service to authenticate users on our side

item2.name: Matomo
item2.description: : an open-source analytics platform that is known for being especially privacy-protection friendly. We need this tool to know how our visitors interact with our service in order to continuously improve their experience

item3.name: Sentry
item3.description: : a service to report issues you may encounter during your visit on our website. This is to inform us of existing bugs so that we can fix them as soon as possible

item4.name: Recaptcha
item4.description: : Google's captcha solution. This is only used on the contact form to prevent spam
